requirement.permission: You don't have the needed permissions to run this command!

subcommand.invalid: Invalid subcommand. Try one of the following options: `$previousCmd <$cmdlist>

command.suggestion: Did you mean {{command}}? (Type {{acceptCommand}} to run this)

help.pageStructure:
Available Commands (page $currPage/$maxPage): 

$content

Run `$prefix$helpCmd <command>` to learn more about it. You can also include subcommands.
For example: `$prefix$helpCmd command subcommandName`

Tip: Use the arrows beneath this message to turn pages, or specify the required page by using `$prefixhelp <page number>`

cmdHandler.invalidFlag:
Invalid flag `$invalidFlag`. It doesn't match any options on this command.
`$previousCmd $invalidFlag`

page.invalid: {{number}} is not a valid page number!

permissions.message: Please grant me the {{permission}} permission in {{channel}} or contact a server administrator. I am unable to operate without this.

commands.clear: Remove all songs from the queue.
commands.join: Make the bot join a specific voice channel.
commands.leave: Make the bot leave your current voice channel
commands.list: List the songs in the queue of your current voice channel.
commands.login: Confirm the login of your account on the website
commands.loop: Toggle the looping of your queue/song.
commands.lyrics: Fetch the lyrics of the current song. Please note that the lyrics might differ from the actual ones, as Genius doesn't always find the right song.
commands.np: Request the name and url of the currently playing song.
commands.pause: Pause the playback in your voice channel
commands.ping: My prefix in this server is: {{prefix}}
commands.play: Play a youtube video from url/query or a playlist by url. Other services are supported as well.
commands.player: Create an emoji player control for your voice channel
commands.playnext: Same as %play. The result will be added to the top of the queue.
commands.remove: Remove a specific song from the queue.
commands.resume: Resume the playback in your voice channel
commands.search: Display the search results for a given query
commands.settings: Change/Get settings in the current server.
commands.stats: Display stats about the bot like the uptime.
commands.support: The support server for Remix. Feel free to ask help, report bugs or just chat :)
commands.thumbnail: Request the thumbnail of the currently playing song.

join.channel: Specify the channel, the bot should join. This is necessary due to (current) Revolt limitations.

login.id: The id you got from logging in at the dashboard.

loop.type: Specifies what loop should be toggled.

play.query: A YouTube query/url, playlist url, or a link to a Spotify, SoundCloud, or YouTube Music song.

playnext.query: A YouTube query/url, playlist url, or a link to a Spotify, SoundCloud, or YouTube Music song.

remove.index: The position of the song in the queue. You can view the indices with the 'list' command

search.provider: The search result provider. (YouTube or YouTube Music)

get.setting: Get the current value of a setting.

set.setting: The name of the setting you want to set.

volume.volume: The new volume in percentages (e.g. `30` or `100`). If you go above 100% there might be quality loss.

embed.sclosedContent:
{{content}}
Session closed - Changing pages **won't work** from here.

perms.messages: I am unable to send messages in {{channel}}. Please contact a server administrator and grant me the "SendMessage" permission.
perms.reactions: I need reaction permissions to work. Please contact a server administrator to address this.

settings.get: Get the value of a specific setting or the settings of the server.
settings.set: Set the value of a specific setting.

error.dc: It doesn't look like we're in the same voice channel.
error.invalid: Invalid voice channel. Please try again and check capitalization! (`x` to cancel)
error.perms: Something went wrong. Unable to join {{channel}}. Do I have the needed permission?

warning.nc: You don't seem to be connected to {{channel}}. Did you forget to join?
